civianmod.config.tab.item.title: Item Settings
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.crate-c: Crates will always show their item count. What colour would you prefer to differentiate them?
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.compact: Compacted items will always show their item count. What colour would you prefer to differentiate them?
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.repair-:
Should item tooltips include the item's base repair level?
 
WARNING: This is NOT the level that will show up in anvils, which is typically the base-level + 2.
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.damage-: Minecraft limits this information to advanced tooltips by default.
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.exp-ing: Show a tooltip-line if the item is an exp ingredient?
civianmod.config.tab.item.option.safe-mi: Whether you should be prevented from mining blocks if your tool would break.
How much durability should remain when Safe Mining kicks in? Keep in mind that insta-break tools can still break if you set this too low.
civianmod.config.tab.integrations.title: Integration Settings
civianmod.config.tab.integrations.desc: ${mod_name} integrations with other mods and plugins
civianmod.config.tab.integrations.option:
This will let you punch signs entitled [set destination] to set your dest.
 
CivMC (illegal): Must be OFF!

Since ClickDest invokes the /dest command, it's rate limited, or otherwise you risk getting kicked for spam.
 
Each 1000 = 1 second.
civianmod.config.tab.macros.title: Macro Settings
civianmod.config.tab.macros.option.ice-r: Whether to snap your pitch (up/down) to the nearest 45 degrees.
Whether to snap your yaw (left/right) to the nearest 45 degrees.
